citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm to 5:10 pm
on the 28-July-2021. During this time the inspector waited for 40 minutes, called licensee's cell phone number leaving a
message, and knocked on door to the house.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm to 5:10 pm 
on the 28-July-2021. During this time the inspector waited for 40 minutes, called licensee's cell phone number leaving a 
message, and knocked on door to the house. 
 
 
 
End Section
